text: O zhizni blizhney i dalekoy. I o sirotakh zadayut tebe vopros. Skazhi: "Dlya nikh blagoye sovershat' Yest' luchsheye, chto mozhno sdelat'", I yesli primete vy ikh v svoi zaboty, Oni vam stanut brat'ya, - Allakh ved' razlichit tvoryashchego dobro ot sovershayushchego zloye.
